Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Beads strung together and forming a necklace found in one of the richest tombs of Mirgissa/Iken: two hundred and twenty-three olive-shaped black beads, ninety-eight disc-shaped beads made from a bright blue glass or light green enamel, eighty disc-shaped beads made from ostrich eggshells.
